about_the_game:
💗Happiness Double Room💗



I've been abducted.
Abducted by... the sister I've known for years.........

Story of the game

What's the right choice? No matter how I think about it, any decision I make will eventually bring me to my wit's end.
But she told me––
It's ok to have chosen the wrong path, as long as you try your best to make it right, everything will be fine.

Towards the end of summer, while I was feeling suffocated from all of life's pressures, I met her again.
I let out all the stress that I accumulated for 4 years, and even contemplated leaving this world at one point.....
However, she took my hand and guided me towards a new life.

Game Elements

  • It's an interactive simulation
  • An impactful 100,000-word story filled with happiness.
  • Multiple storyline endings
  • Japanese Voiced Female Lead
  • A total of 33 CG scenes and over 300 animated pictures
  • There are 18 erotic CG scenes in total, of which 16 scenes are animated, and over 700 animated pictures

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work

!!Warning!!:This game adult content including full nudity, sexual scenes, suicide, Some of bad end contain NTR story. please make sure you are in the right place to avoid any unnecessary attention.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS Sierra
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS Mojave 10.14.6
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

csrr.descriptors:
This game contains a lot of sexsual contents, you must be at least 18 years old to purchase.

本遊戲含有大量色情描述、圖像，須滿18歲始得購買或使用。

short_description: It's the end of summer, and you've been abducted by a sister you've known for a long time. Forget all your past troubles, distress and everything bothersome, just spend your time happily with Sister in the days to come!
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Russian, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
